instruction: Can the rotational terahertz imaging system's spectral method be considered superior to traditional methods for inline nondestructive testing (NDT) of press sleeves for the paper industry during fabrication?

Traditional methods may not be able to detect these defects until the whole production process is completed. This fast scanning capability, combined with the system's integration into the manufacturing process, can save valuable time and resources during production.
